description:
**Job Title: Full-Time Family Assistant & Property Manager**

  • Location:** Topanga, CA

**We are seeking a proactive, organized, and experienced Family Assistant & Property Manager to join our friendly and down-to-earth family in Topanga, CA. If you are a self-starter with a positive attitude, excellent organizational skills, and experience in house management and personal assistance, we would love to hear from you!**

Responsibilities

**Property & House Management:**

  • Oversee multiple properties in Topanga, Mariposa, and Mendocino.
  • Coordinate house teams, contractors, and maintenance personnel.
  • Manage budget tracking, utilities, and inventory of house products, pet supplies, and groceries.
  • Handle Airbnb property management, with additional earnings for each booking.

Personal Assistance

  • Manage personal and business schedules, including appointments, travel, and events.
  • Run errands, such as grocery shopping, dry cleaning, and mail handling.
  • Assist with child care, including coordinating activities and appointments.
  • Coordinate pet care, including vet appointments, grooming, and pet sitting.

Communication & Organization

  • Send daily schedule emails and end-of-day summaries.
  • Coordinate family gatherings, business meetings, and podcast recordings.
  • Maintain open communication and follow through on all tasks and deadlines.
  • Organize and declutter living spaces, such as cupboards, closets, and shelves.

Travel Coordination

  • Book and coordinate all travel for the family and house teams.
  • Handle airport pick-ups and drop-offs.
  • Manage car maintenance and servicing.

Qualifications

  • Proven experience (1-3 years) in personal assistance, project management, or a similar role.
  • House and property management experience, with Airbnb management experience a plus.
  • Previous nannying or child care experience, with a love for children.
  • Love for pets and willingness to assist with pet care.
  • Excellent organizational skills and ability to multitask.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and a positive, can-do attitude.
  • Knowledge of healthy, organic foods and cooking.
  • Reliable vehicle with insurance and willingness to drive as needed.
  • Flexible schedule and ability to live in the Los Angeles area, preferably the westside.
  • Ability to handle both onsite and remote work, with occasional travel.
  • Skilled at finding and managing vendors, such as swim teachers, plumbers, etc.

Compensation & Benefits

  • Monthly salary of $6,000.
  • 7% earnings on Airbnb house bookings.
  • Paid vacation, PTO, and sick days.
  • Mileage reimbursement.
  • Health benefits (Medical, Dental, and Vision) and simple IRA after the probation period.

To Apply

Please submit your resume, three previous employee references, and if applicable, your previous Airbnb profile and reviews. Only candidates meeting the requirements will be considered.

Join our family and help us maintain our happy and organized lifestyle! We look forward to hearing from you.

*This role is subject to changes based on the family's needs, and new projects or priorities may arise.*

Employment Type: Full-Time
